Microsoft releases Phi-4 language model trained mainly on synthetic data - SiliconANGLE News
summary:
Microsoft releases Phi-4 language model trained mainly on synthetic data

Date: October 2023 | Source: SiliconANGLE

Microsoft Corp. has introduced Phi-4, a small language model that excels in solving math problems, trained primarily on synthetic data, showcasing potential advancements in model reasoning through innovative training methods.

  • Phi-4 is the fourth iteration of Microsoft’s open-source language model series.
  • It features 14 billion parameters, capable of processing prompts with up to 4,000 tokens.
  • The model was trained using 50 synthetic datasets containing approximately 400 billion tokens.
  • Phi-4 outperformed its predecessor and competitive models like GPT-4o and Llama 3.3 in key benchmarks.
  • It incorporates advanced tokenizer and attention mechanisms for better processing of user inputs.
“Phi-4 outperforms comparable and larger models on math related reasoning due to advancements throughout the processes, including the use of high-quality synthetic datasets, curation of high-quality organic data, and post-training innovations.” - Ece Kamar, Managing Director of Microsoft’s AI Frontiers group.

Phi-4 is currently available through Microsoft’s Azure AI Foundry service, with plans to release the code on Hugging Face soon, marking a significant step in AI development leveraging synthetic data for language models.

Google’s Android XR May Usher in New Generation of Smart Glasses - TechRepublic
summary:
Google’s Android XR: Ushering in New Era of Smart Glasses

Publication Date: December 12, 2024

Source: TechRepublic

Google aims to reenter the smart glasses market with its newly unveiled Android XR operating system, differentiating itself with advanced AI features.

  • Android XR is designed for headsets and smart glasses.
  • First device to launch with Android XR is Samsung's Project Moohan, expected in 2025.
  • The OS allows for natural language interaction using Gemini AI.
  • Features include playing media and displaying photos in a virtual reality format.
  • Google emphasizes the need for stylish, comfortable glasses that integrate with Android devices.
“We want there to be lots of choices of stylish, comfortable glasses you’ll love to wear every day and that work seamlessly with your other Android devices.” - Shahram Izadi, Google’s VP of Extended Reality

Developers can now access the Android XR software development kit and apply for a Developer Bootcamp for early hardware access.

The Google Pixel 9 Pro is the Android Authority Editor's Choice winner for best phone of 2024 - Android Authority
summary:
The Google Pixel 9 Pro is the Android Authority Editor's Choice winner for best phone of 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Android Authority

In a competitive year for smartphones, the Google Pixel 9 Pro has emerged as the Editor's Choice for the best phone of 2024, demonstrating major advancements in camera, AI features, and consistent user experience.

  • The Google Pixel 9 Pro received nearly double the votes compared to its closest competitor.
  • This year marked a split vote among three Pixel devices, yet the Pixel 9 Pro dominated the selection.
  • The mobile industry saw significant developments, including advancements in foldables and AI integrations.
  • Extensive testing and evaluation involved over 40 smartphone models from various brands before making the final selection.
"In 2024, we reviewed over 40 phones. Our expert product testers spend countless hours digging into what makes these devices tick."

As a result of its design, features, and performance, the Google Pixel 9 Pro has been recognized not just for its excellence, but for redefining user expectations in a compact form factor.

title: Google debuts NotebookLM for enterprises - TechCrunch
summary:
Google debuts NotebookLM for enterprises | TechCrunch

Publication Date: October 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

Google has launched NotebookLM for enterprises, enhancing its popular AI note-taking app with features tailored for business use, including improved security and data management.

  • NotebookLM Plus delivers similar functionalities to the consumer version but adds controls for access and data management.
  • Features include enhanced audio summaries, customizable notebook responses, and analytics for shared team notebooks.
  • NotebookLM is integrated within Google Cloud's Agentspace platform, which supports various AI-powered tools.
  • Available both through Google Workspace and separately via Google Cloud, with plans for individual access in early 2025.
  • The app's redesign offers a more organized experience, separating tools across three distinct panels.
  • An experimental feature allows users to interact with AI-generated podcast hosts in real-time.
“Millions of users have used NotebookLM to make sense of complex information,” said Raj Pai, VP of Cloud AI at Google.

This launch marks a significant step for Google as it seeks to integrate AI tools into enterprise solutions, responding to growing demands for secure and efficient business applications.

title: Windows 11 KB5048667 install fails, performance, gaming issues. Windows 11 24H2 affected - WindowsLatest
summary:
Windows 11 KB5048667 install fails, performance, gaming issues. Windows 11 24H2 affected.

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Windows Latest

Windows 11 update KB5048667 has been reported to cause installation failures, performance degradation, and gaming issues for users, particularly affecting the Windows 11 24H2 version.

  • The KB5048667 update is failing to install for numerous users with error code 0x800f081f.
  • Performance issues include slower CPU operations and gaming stutters, especially in titles like Roblox and League of Legends.
  • Some users experience a temporary fix with reboots, but the problem reappears after extended use.
  • Additional reported problems include increased CPU temperatures and playback issues with streaming apps like Netflix and Prime Video.
  • Users have shared various attempted fixes, including rolling back to previous versions and adjusting power settings.
"The update broken my machine. After installing it my machine would fail to boot..."

Windows Latest suggests that until further updates are released, users may want to refrain from installing KB5048667 due to ongoing performance concerns and installation issues.

title: Twirling body horror in gymnastics video exposes AI’s flaws - Ars Technica
summary:
Twirling body horror in gymnastics video exposes AI’s flaws

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Ars Technica

On Wednesday, a video of an AI-generated gymnast by OpenAI’s Sora went viral, revealing serious flaws in AI video generation capabilities.

  • The video features a gymnast with absurd, morphing features, including sprouting extra limbs and losing her head.
  • Venture capitalist Deedy Das highlighted gymnastics as a challenging benchmark for AI's understanding of movement.
  • Despite improvements in Sora's performance, the AI still produces nonsensical outputs when given complex prompts.
  • The current limitations are partly due to insufficient training data and the AI's lack of understanding of physics.
  • As AI video technology progresses, it's expected that coherence and realism will improve.
"As cool as the new Sora is, gymnastics is still very much the Turing test for AI video." - Deedy Das

In conclusion, the absurdities displayed in Sora's gymnastics video underscore the ongoing challenges in AI video generation, indicating that much work remains before these models can produce credible outputs.

title: Huawei Unfolds a New Paradigm with HUAWEI Mate X6, Introducing New Innovative Architecture and Live Multi-View - PR Newswire
summary:
Huawei Unfolds a New Paradigm with HUAWEI Mate X6, Introducing New Innovative Architecture and Live Multi-View

Publication Date: Not provided
Source: PRNewswire

Huawei has unveiled the HUAWEI Mate X6, an advanced foldable smartphone that boasts significant upgrades across various features, setting a high bar in foldable innovation.

  • HUAWEI Mate X6 includes a 6.45-inch OLED external screen and a 7.93-inch internal screen with high resolution.
  • The design is inspired by planetary orbits, emphasizing the brand's space-age aesthetic.
  • Introduces Ultra Aperture XMAGE Camera with groundbreaking color accuracy.
  • Offers new features such as Live Multi-task for efficient app usage.
  • Improved durability and cooling capabilities achieved through innovative materials and design.
"a breakthrough technology from the inside to out, bringing consumers a fully innovative foldable screen experience." - Richard Yu, Chairman of Huawei Consumer Business Group

The HUAWEI Mate X6 marks a significant step forward in foldable smartphone technology, showcasing cutting-edge features and a commitment to aesthetic innovation.

Apple is making own Bluetooth, Wi-Fi chip for iPhone, smart home: Details - The Financial Express
summary:
Apple is making own Bluetooth, Wi-Fi chip for iPhone, smart home: Details

Publication Date: October 29, 2023

Source: Financial Express

Apple is set to develop a new Bluetooth and Wi-Fi chip, code-named Proxima, aiming to replace current Broadcom components by 2025, enhancing its technology strategy.

  • The new chip, Proxima, has been in development for several years.
  • It will reduce reliance on third-party providers and improve integration with Apple products.
  • Production will be carried out in partnership with Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
  • This initiative is separate from Apple's transition away from Qualcomm's cellular modems, although integration of both technologies is speculated.
  • Broadcom's stock fell by 3.9% to $175.99 following the news, while Apple's shares rose by less than 1% to $248.53.
“The future roadmap includes a more energy-efficient end-to-end wireless approach integrated with other components.”

This development reflects Apple's ongoing strategy to enhance its hardware capabilities and reduce dependence on external suppliers, as they continue to innovate across their product ecosystem.

title: From concept to community, BEAUTY&YOU INDIA is impacting India’s Next Generation of beauty innovators - VOGUE India
summary:
From concept to community, BEAUTY&YOU INDIA is impacting India’s next generation of beauty innovators

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Beauty Innovation News

In recent years, the beauty industry in India has evolved into a vibrant space that merges global trends with local influences, driven by a new generation that values authenticity. The BEAUTY&YOU INDIA platform supports this change by providing mentorship and resources to emerging beauty innovators.

  • The BEAUTY&YOU INDIA platform is an initiative by Estée Lauder Companies and NYKAA, launched in 2022.
  • It focuses on empowering India's beauty founders with mentorship and financial support.
  • In its first year, the initiative received over 300 entries from 50 cities across various beauty categories.
  • The 2023 edition expanded to include over 600 entries focused on 'Decoding the Indian Beauty Standards'.
  • The 2024 theme 'Supercharged Futures' attracted over 660 applications and highlighted innovation and sustainability.
  • Notable winners include SkinInspired, Not Just Vanilla, and Journey of Objects, showcasing diverse beauty solutions.
“We launched BEAUTY&YOU INDIA in 2022 as a platform to give back to the Indian beauty community and inspire the next generation of entrepreneurs,” - Shana Randhawa, Estée Lauder Companies.

BEAUTY&YOU INDIA continues to build connections between India's heritage and future, fostering sustainability and innovation in the beauty sector. To learn more about the initiative, click here.

title: In-house victory? Here's how Sony PlayStation 5 helped AstroBot win Game of the Year award - The Economic Times
summary:
In-house victory? Here's how Sony PlayStation 5 helped AstroBot win Game of the Year award

Publication Date: December 13, 2024

Source: The Feed

AstroBot has made a remarkable impact in the gaming industry by winning the Game of the Year award at the 11th Game Awards, illustrating the effective strategies employed by Team Asobi along with the influence of the PlayStation 5 console.

  • AstroBot won the Game of the Year award during the gala held at the Peacock Theater in Los Angeles.
  • The game achieved multiple nominations including Best Family Game and won several awards in different categories.
  • AstroBot was pre-installed on every PS5 console, allowing it to reach a wider audience as the first game played by new PS5 users.
  • The game is available for free and includes features for testing controller functionality, enhancing the user experience.
  • AstroBot was developed as a sequel to Astro's Playroom, released exclusively for PlayStation 5.
“AstroBot's popularity primarily stems from the fact that the game was pre-installed on PS5 consoles, meaning it would technically be the first game that PS5 users would have played when they bought the console.”

AstroBot's success is a testament to strategic marketing and the advantages of exclusive titles on next-generation consoles, showcasing how first impressions can influence long-term popularity in the gaming market.
